original: intros P B C H. induction H as [| B1 B2 H1 H2 IH]. - exists []. split. + unfold incl. intros x Contra. inversion Contra. + reflexivity. - destruct IH as [A [H3 H4]]. destruct H1 as [A' [H5 H6 H7]]. exists (A' ++ A). split. + apply incl_app_left in H5. destruct H5 as [H8 H9]. apply incl_app_left in H8. destruct H8 as [H10 H11]. apply incl_app_left. split. * apply incl_trans with (A':=A')(B:=B1)(C:=C). ++ apply incl_trans with (A':=A)(B:=B2)(C:=C). auto. auto. ++ auto. * auto. + unfold gamma1. rewrite map_app. rewrite H7. rewrite H4. reflexivity.
